buyanova.repository

Interface Repository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of entity it should provide access to.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BetRepository, HorseRepository, OddsRepository, RaceRepository, UserRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SqlBetRepository, SqlHorseRepository, SqlOddsRepository, SqlRaceRepository, SqlUserRepository

    public interface Repository<T>
    Repository interface uses repository pattern to manipulate data on the data access level.

    Every entity that is to be stored should have an interface that extends Repository interface and parameterize it with its type.

    See Also:
    UserRepository, BetRepository, HorseRepository, OddsRepository, RaceRepository

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds an item to the specified data source.

      void update(T item)
      Updates information about item in the specified data source.

  throws RepositoryException
        Adds an item to the specified data source.

        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a data source access error occurs

      • query

        java.util.List<T> query(Specification specification)
                 throws RepositoryException
        Returns a list of T items that match the criteria indicated by specification.
        Parameters:
        specification - instance of Specification interface that provides criteria for the query
        Returns:
        list of items that suit the criteria of the specification
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a data source access error occurs
        See Also:
        Specification
